name: df-mulg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmg, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cz, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), csb(s3, cseq(nat1, cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cxp(cn, csn(cv(s2)))), cif(cfv(cv(s3), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cminusg, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s3), cneg(cv(s1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s1), nat0)))))
comment: Define the group multiple function, also known as group exponentiation when viewed multiplicatively. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2014.)
